steps.description: 1. In the row that contains the existing yellow cell (the single '4'), fill the three leftmost cells of that row (columns 0–2) with color 4 so that that row becomes [4,4,4,...].
2. In the row immediately below that same row, fill the three leftmost cells (columns 0–2) with color 4.
3. In the row two rows below the original yellow cell, fill the three leftmost cells (columns 0–2) with color 4.
